about_the_game:
Orc Incursion is a real-time strategy game that has both Player vs. Environment (PvE) and Player vs. Player (PvP) modes. Whether defending your base from relentless waves of orcs or waging war against other players, every decision matters in this high-stakes battle for supremacy.

In Survival Mode, players must strategically defend their base against increasingly powerful waves of enemy orcs while launching decisive attacks to destroy the enemy base. The game also features a story-driven campaign where players can delve into the lore of the Orc Incursion universe and hone their skills through structured missions.

The Hero System, allowing players to recruit powerful heroes to lead their armies. Heroes can be leveled up during gameplay, unlocking devastating abilities and spells that can turn the tide of battle in critical moments. Whether summoning firestorms, healing allies, or stunning enemies, your hero is the ultimate weapon in your strategic arsenal.

Players must use their tactical skills to:

  • Build and manage their base efficiently.

  • Train and upgrade units for maximum effectiveness.

  • Research powerful technologies to outmaneuver opponents.

  • Utilize heroes’ powerful abilities to control the battlefield.

Key Features

  • Dynamic real-time strategy gameplay, blending survival and skirmish elements.

  • Player vs. Environment (PvE) and Player vs. Player (PvP) modes for endless replayability.

  • Hero System: Level up your hero, unlock game-changing spells, and dominate the battlefield.

  • Survival Mode: Defend your base against waves of enemy orcs while plotting your counterattack.

  • Campaign Mode: Immerse yourself in the story with a series of structured, challenging missions.

  • Diverse units and structures: Choose from a variety of options, each with unique strengths and weaknesses.

  • Strategic depth: Balance resource management, unit composition, and hero abilities to achieve victory.

Prepare for an epic battle where strategy, skill, and a touch of heroism will decide your fate. Will you conquer the orc threat, or will your defenses crumble under the pressure?

We hope you enjoy playing Orc Incursion and look forward to hearing your feedback!
